医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球研究证实泮托拉唑在减少 ICU 上消化道出血方面的作用麦克马斯特大学研究人员领导的一项全球研究和荟萃分析结果显示，一种广泛使用的药物有助于使用呼吸机的危重成人预防上消化道出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Global-study-confirms-泮托拉唑-role-in-reducing-upper-GI-bleeding-in-the-ICU.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Global-study-confirms-泮托拉唑-role-in-reducing-upper-GI-bleeding-in-the-ICU.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a98e367f-bb1b-48af-8253-4760ed9ca51a Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:33:00 -0400 Global study confirms pantoprazole's role in reducing upper GI bleeding in the ICU
科学家揭示了红光调节组氨酸激酶如何发挥作用的新见解科学家们揭示了红光调节组氨酸激酶如何发挥作用的新信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Scientists-reveal-new-insights-into-how-red-light-regulated-histidine-kinases-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Scientists-reveal-new-insights-into-how-red-light-regulated-histidine-kinases-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fea0c24-cd84-4f92-b86b-a518085e756f Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:24:00 -0400 Scientists reveal new insights into how red light-regulated histidine kinases function
研究表明夜间体力活动对葡萄糖代谢的好处格拉纳达大学 (UGR) 的一组科学家获得的结果可能具有多种实际意义，特别是对于有患胰岛素抵抗或 2 型糖尿病风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Study-shows-the-benefits-of-evening-physical-activity-on-glucose-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Study-shows-the-benefits-of-evening-physical-activity-on-glucose-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f1aba8d-129d-4a2c-824f-3e83a555c647 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:16:00 -0400 Study shows the benefits of evening physical activity on glucose metabolism
新模型预测妊娠高血压大鼠心脏大小的变化根据计算机模型预测，患有高血压的怀孕老鼠的心脏比正常怀孕的老鼠的心脏增大得更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-model-predicts-heart-size-variations-in-pregnant-rats-with-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-model-predicts-heart-size-variations-in-pregnant-rats-with-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f490d9d-4ca9-4244-80e4-c3887c0d7125 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 11:09:00 -0400 New model predicts heart size variations in pregnant rats with hypertension
塔夫茨大学新型可摄入微生物采样药丸完成临床前试验塔夫茨大学工程学院在开发一种小型设备方面取得了重大进展，该设备大约有维生素药丸大小，可以吞咽并通过胃肠道，对个体胃肠道中的全部微生物进行采样。道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tufts-new-ingestible-microbiome-sampling-pill-completes-preclinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tufts-new-ingestible-microbiome-sampling-pill-completes-preclinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6f37a23-5084-431a-b57e-5806e71bd40b Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:59:00 -0400 Tufts' new ingestible microbiome sampling pill completes preclinical trials
创新的 3D 细胞培养方法为癌细胞力学提供了新的见解开发针对乳腺癌的化疗药物成本高昂、速度缓慢且通常效率低下，超过 95% 的筛选候选药物在患者试验中失败。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Innovative-3D-cell-culturing-method-offers-new-insights-into-cancer-cell-mechanics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Innovative-3D-cell-culturing-method-offers-new-insights-into-cancer-cell-mechanics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45fa977e-6494-45df-b826-4ae2bef56ee6 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:50:00 -0400 Innovative 3D cell culturing method offers new insights into cancer cell mechanics
怀孕期间接种 COVID-19 疫苗可降低剖宫产和高血压的风险一项研究表明，接种了 Covid-19 疫苗的孕妇进行剖腹产或患高血压的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/COVID-19-vaccination-in-pregnancy-lowers-risk-of-cesarean-section-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/COVID-19-vaccination-in-pregnancy-lowers-risk-of-cesarean-section-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=105bcc50-c53e-4d8e-9056-d5a1e9747c77 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:42:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccination in pregnancy lowers risk of cesarean section, hypertension
关于脂肪因子在心房颤动发病机制中作用的新见解宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心房颤动 (AF) 是一种常见的心律失常，其特征是心房不规则且频繁快速的电活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-the-role-of-adipokines-in-atrial-fibrillation-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-the-role-of-adipokines-in-atrial-fibrillation-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0587a1d3-5485-491d-87fc-630810db412e Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:34:00 -0400 New insights into the role of adipokines in atrial fibrillation pathogenesis
新的 EULAR 调查：邀请欧洲各地的患者分享 RMD 经验EULAR 的新调查旨在收集欧洲各地患者对风湿病和肌肉骨骼疾病 (RMD) 影响的宝贵见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-EULAR-survey-Patients-across-Europe-in​​vited-to-share-RMD-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-EULAR-survey-Patients-across-Europe-in​​vited-to-share-RMD-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c95b9ea-9375-4ff0-ae39-824a3c4df140 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:26:00 -0400 New EULAR survey: Patients across Europe invited to share RMD experiences
EULAR 支持使用 RECLARIT 进行炎症性关节炎的自我管理EULAR - 欧洲风湿病协会联盟 - 建议炎症性关节炎患者进行自我管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-endorses-self-management-of-炎症-关节炎-with-RECLARIT.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-endorses-self-management-of-炎症-关节炎-with-RECLARIT.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57b3ef24-a86c-4ace-bcda-802e0f092111 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:19:00 -0400 EULAR endorses self-management of inflammatory arthritis with RECLARIT
